Cam Watanabe trained for years under his father’s strict tutelage, then received the mystical Samurai Amulet!

Robert “RJ” James mentored the Jungle Fury Rangers before revealing his own abilities as the Wolf Ranger!

—description from the publisher
Families: Game: Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid

Name: Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid – Villain Pack #4: A Dark Turn
Description:
"When we're finished, there will be no good left in the universe! No love. No happiness. Only chaos." -Astronema

Mesogog and Astronema, two of the most devious and powerful enemies the Power Rangers have ever faced, have arrived with destruction in their wake! Before they became terrifying masterminds at the head of their own armies, both of these villains were once close allies of the Power Rangers.

Astronema leads a vicious assault on Earth, accompanied by her merciless lieutenant Ecliptor, while Mesogog the dinosaur-human hybrid commands his own deadly majordomo Elsa, as well as Tommy Oliver's cyborg nemesis Zeltrax.

—description from the publisher
Families: Game: Power Rangers: Heroes of the Grid

Name: Arkham Horror: The Card Game – By the Book: Challenge Scenario
Description:
Yet another body has been uncovered in the Black Cave. With due diligence, you seek the truth and believe the mastermind of the murders is a congressman, Mr. Grey. This is an unprecedented case for you. Will you be able to take down such a powerful politician and his ring of conspirators?

By the Book is a special print-and-play challenge scenario for Arkham Horror: The Card Game designed to be played with Roland Banks.

This scenario can be played as either a standalone scenario or as a side-story inserted into any campaign. In order to play this scenario, a copy of the Core Set and the printed print-and-play files are required.

The print-and-play files can be downloaded in the Support Section at the end of this page: https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/products/arkham-horror-the-card-game/ in the Print-and-Play Cards section.

—description from the publisher
Families: Game: Arkham Horror – The Card Game
Game: Arkham Horror TCG – Challenge Scenarios & Parallel Investigators
Series: Arkham Horror Files (Fantasy Flight Games)

Name: Monarch: Brawl
Description:
Monarch: Brawl is a game of insectoid strategy for two players.  Take control of an army of crawling, flying, stinging bugs and outwit your opponent.  But don’t leave yourself open to attack! Win the game by getting your insects through your opponent’s defenses.

Combining elements of chance from classic card games like War with the grid and movement of chess, this game is meant for all ages.  It can be learned quickly, but provides deeper levels of play, with no two games being the same.

—description from the designer

Name: City District
Description:
In City District, players use the results of 25 die rolls to build different city features in the plots of their city by drawing them in. The player with the most points will win the game.

The die rolls allow a player to choose between drawing "basic" facilities, such as parks, residential areas, or commercial areas, and "special" facilities, such as stadiums, bus stations, and museums.  The different facilities each have a base score, and can earn additional points for what they are next to, for instance, the bus station earns additional points for being next to a road, and residential areas are worth less points if they are next to an industrial area.

Name: Kukulkán
Description:
Easy and smart roll & write game about the building of the Temple of Kukulkán, a Mayan step pyramid also known as "El Castillo".

Rolling only one six sided die the players may choose to draw lines to define the stones of the construction, or write numbers inside each stone space (taking in account that the number is the weight of the stone and it's not allowed to apile a heavier stone onto a lighter one!) or finally mark with a cross any numbered stone in the temple to score a victory point.

Bonuses and helps may be achieved or used by the players during the gameplay. When the game end is triggered all players sum their points and bonuses and the player with the most points will be the winner builder of the Temple of Kukulkán.

—description from the designer

Name: Scrap Racer: Expansion 1
Description:
Two new Racers with unique abilities expand the driver field and allows to play with up to 8 players.

Three new race tracks - each with their own rules - mix up the racers' positions.

The Pit Stop allows players to upgrade their racer with new abilities.

Name: Sapsucker
Description: This is a fast-paced two player games which also offer surprising depth. It combines mechanisms of tug of war with dual winning condition. While collecting sap to lure the sapsuckers, player also has to consider the dice he will leave to his opponent. It is important because besides the final scoring at the end, player can also win by successfully attracting one of the sapsucker to his side.
